title: Starting Ranked 5s Team ( Need Only Top) and subs
body:
Starting a competitive ranked 5s team.

Roles needed: ~~Mid~~, Top, ~~Jungle, Adc, Supp~~ Also need to have some flex players.

Goals: To have fun while being competitive and learning more about the game, I hope to meet some new people and learn from 1 another to achieve as much as possible

If interested my IGN is **milks22 **feel free to add me

replies.body: My favorite lane is top but i can play every other role pretty well except jg
I am a mid main, was silver last season, but haven't played much ranked this season yet. I would love to join. Just add me if you would like me. Thank You.
